short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds Export button to code blocks in ChatGPT responses, allowing users to save code as file.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds a new button to ChatGPT website, which allows the user to directly download code snippets, as code files with placeholder names. For example, a javascript code snippet will be saved as script.js and a python code snippet will be saved as main.py
